menu.name: Momo
menu.description: Momo is a type of steamed dumpling with some form of filling. Momo has become a traditional delicacy in Nepal, Tibet and among Nepalese/Tibetan communities in Bhutan, as well as people of Ladakh, Northeast India and Darjeeling regions of India.

menu.name: Chowmein
menu.description: A classic Chinese dish of stir-fried egg noodles with shredded chicken breast - experiment with different fish, meat, or vegetables.

menu.name: Cappuccino
menu.description: Composed of double espresso and hot milk, with the surface topped with foamed milk.

menu.name: Tea
menu.description: Tea is an aromatic beverage commonly prepared by pouring hot or boiling water over cured leaves of the Camellia sinensis, an evergreen shrub (bush) native to East Asia.

menu.name: Coffee
menu.description: Coffee is a brewed drink prepared from roasted coffee beans, the seeds of berries from certain Coffea species.

menu.name: Lassi
menu.description: Lassi is a blend of yoghurt, water, spices and sometimes fruit.

menu.name: Chicken curry
menu.description: Its a delicious curry with chicken.

menu.name: Fish curry
menu.description: Its a delicious curry with fish.

menu.name: Dal fry
menu.description: Its fried daal. Not just that, Its way better than the daal your home-daal.

menu.name: Blended Oreo Shake
menu.description: Cool and delicious oreo shake for summer.

menu.name: Mango Lassi
menu.description: Refreshen your heart with mango lassi.

menu.name: Popcorn
menu.description: This is the delicious popcorn with ghee and salt.

menu.name: Caramel Topped Ice cream dessert
menu.description: This is the dish that most of the customers love. Fresh caramel Topped Ice cream dessert.

menu.name: Ice cream cookie dessert
menu.description: Chocolaty layered ice cream dessert.

menu.name: Berries and cream
menu.description: This two ingredient recipe with berries mixed with cream makes your day.

menu.name: Kitkat ice cream pie
menu.description: This easy ice cream pie is bursting with KitKat in every bite! Vanilla ice cream dotted with crispy kitkat

menu.name: Ice Cream Dessert Taco
menu.description: Vanilla Ice-cream in the shape of a taco.

menu.name: Espresso
menu.description: Espresso coffee is made with a wide variety of coffee beans and roasts..

menu.name: Samosa
menu.description: Triangular pastry filled with spiced meat or vegetables and fried in ghee or oil.

menu.name: Butter Chicken
menu.description: Butter Chicken simmers in a buttery tomato sauce and is punctuated by several special spices .

menu.name: Veg Caesar Salad
menu.description: The ultimate vegetarian Caesar salad - with homemade Caesar dressing, and tons of toppings.

menu.name: Chicken Caesar Salad
menu.description: A classic chicken salad,, featuring crunchy croutons and a creamy, garlic dressing.

menu.name: Thai Caesar Salad
menu.description: A classic thai caesar salad, featuring crunchy croutons and a creamy, garlic dressing.

menu.description: A classic Ginger-Sesame  salad.
